mods.abstract: Interview and performance by Terri Clark from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 12, 2013. Presented in conjunction with the spotlight exhibit Terri Clark: Canadian Country Star.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
